Literature Review: Construction robotics has been a rapidly evolving field over the past few decades, with significant advancements in automation, sensing, and human-robot collaboration. The construction industry, however, remains one of the most complex and challenging sectors to integrate robotics into. This review aims to analyze the role of robotics in construction and architecture, highlighting current trends and challenges in shifting from pure automation towards collaborative and adaptive processes.
